item.title: WIT Resources
item.description: Support for “resources” just landed in the wit-bindgen repository. This post explores why resources are crucial for writing rich, object-oriented APIs in WIT.

item.title: Thoughts on WIT and wit-bindgen
item.description: The Wasm component model uses WIT to define runtime APIs available to guest components. wit-bindgen can then be used by both guest component authors and host platforms to generate bindings in their language of choice to consume or implement these runtime APIs respectively. This post discusses some of the rough edges encountered when taking this for a spin.
